articles.description: The Realme X3 SuperZoom boasts of a flagship-level processor and telephoto camera system, all at a reasonable price. But is it worth buying? Read our review to find out.
articles.content: Realme has once again raised the bar for what consumers should expect from a mid-range premium smartphone with its new X3 and X3 SuperZoom devices. With prices starting at just Rs. 24,999 for the Rea… [+12558 chars]

articles.description: As the Indian government has called for a ban on Chinese-made apps - CamScanner and Shareit, you will most likely need other apps to share files or scan documents. Here are some best alternatives you can use.

articles.description: Windows File Recovery app is a new app from Microsoft that can recover deleted files. It's a command line tool that has some advanced options.

articles.title: Facebook starts rolling out Dark Theme for more users on Android and iOS - Gizchina.com
articles.description: Facebook is quietly rolling out a new update for the Facebook App on Android and iOS that finally brings the Dark Mode. Not for all users though.
